    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target

aa.name: Brutal Decimation
effects:
• Grants the spell Brutal Decimation.
    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Exposed Weaknesses
effects:
• Grants the spell Exposed Weaknesses.
    • Decreases Mitigation of target vs physical, elemental and noxious damage by 46
    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that inflicts damage and impairs physical, elemental and noxious mitigation.

aa.name: Spirit Drain
effects:
• Grants the spell Spirit Drain.
    • Inflicts 17 - 29 melee damage on target encounter
    • Heals group members (AE) for 7 - 11
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that allows them to absorb health from the target encounter and heal the group.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target

aa.name: Brutal Decimation
effects:
• Grants the spell Brutal Decimation.
    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Exposed Weaknesses
effects:

    • Decreases Mitigation of target vs physical, elemental and noxious damage by 46
    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that inflicts damage and impairs physical, elemental and noxious mitigation.

aa.name: Brutal Decimation
effects:
• Grants the spell Brutal Decimation.
    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

    • Decreases Mitigation of target vs physical, elemental and noxious damage by 46
    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target

aa.name: Brutal Decimation
effects:
• Grants the spell Brutal Decimation.
    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that inflicts damage and impairs physical, elemental and noxious mitigation.

aa.name: Spirit Drain
effects:
• Grants the spell Spirit Drain.
    • Inflicts 17 - 29 melee damage on target encounter
    • Heals group members (AE) for 7 - 11
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that allows them to absorb health from the target encounter and heal the group.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Exposed Weaknesses
effects:
• Grants the spell Exposed Weaknesses.
    • Decreases Mitigation of target vs physical, elemental and noxious damage by 46
    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that inflicts damage and impairs physical, elemental and noxious mitigation.

aa.name: Brutal Decimation
effects:
• Grants the spell Brutal Decimation.
    • Inflicts 65 - 109 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new attack that inflicts high damage on the target enemy.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Exposed Weaknesses
effects:
• Grants the spell Exposed Weaknesses.
    • Decreases Mitigation of target vs physical, elemental and noxious damage by 46
    • Inflicts 54 - 91 melee damage on target
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that inflicts damage and impairs physical, elemental and noxious mitigation.

aa.name: Spirit Drain
effects:
• Grants the spell Spirit Drain.
    • Inflicts 17 - 29 melee damage on target encounter
    • Heals group members (AE) for 7 - 11
aa.description: Grants the warder a new ability that allows them to absorb health from the target encounter and heal the group.

aa.name: Devour
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Devour. Devour is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and restores a portion of the damage to the beastlord as health.
aa.description: This Feral Primal absorbs health from the target and restores it to the beastlord. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Feral Charge
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Feral Charge. Feral Charge is a Feral Primal that inflicts damage to the target and teleports the beastlord to their target if they are further than ten meters from their target.
aa.description: This Feral Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target and the beastlord lunges to their enemy if they are out of melee range. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.

aa.name: Soulbreath
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Soulbreath. Soulbreath is a Spiritual Primal that restores health to the group and improves the group's Crit Bonus for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal restores health to the group and improves their Crit Bonus. This ability equips in the fifth primal slot.

aa.name: Truespirit Strike
effects: • The beastlord's warder grants the beastlord a new Primal: Truespirit Strike. Truespirit Strike is a Spiritual Primal that inflicts damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second for a short duration.
aa.description: This Spiritual Primal inflicts moderate damage to the target encounter and increases the group's damage per second. This ability equips in the sixth primal slot.
